pageProps.suffix:

type cases = [

  Expect<Equal<KebabCase<'foo-bar'>, 'foo-bar'>>,
  Expect<Equal<KebabCase<'foo_bar'>, 'foo_bar'>>,
  Expect<Equal<KebabCase<'Foo-Bar'>, 'foo--bar'>>,
  Expect<Equal<KebabCase<'ABC'>, 'a-b-c'>>,
  Expect<Equal<KebabCase<'-'>, '-'>>,
  Expect<Equal<KebabCase<''>, ''>>,
